#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int a, b, i, j, temp, m, n, x, sum;

	scanf("%d %d", &a, &b );

	vector<int> A( 3000 );
	m = 0;
	n = a;
	while( a > 0 ) {
		
		A[ m++ ] = a % 10;
		a /= 10;
	}

	for( i = 2;i <= b;i++ ) {
		
		temp = 0;

		for( j = 0;j < m;j++ ) {
			
			x = A[ j ]*n + temp;
			A[ j ] = x % 10;
			temp = x/10;
		}

		while( temp > 0 ) {
			
			A[ m++ ] = temp % 10;
			temp /= 10;
		}
	}

	for( i = m - 1;i >= 0;i-- )
		printf("%d", A[ i ] );
	printf("\n");

	for( i = 0, sum = 0;i < m;i++ )
		sum += A[ i ];

	printf("%d\n", sum );

	return 0;
}
